Fujita Goro in the Seinan War Newspaper
http://www.3-hajime.com/dekigoto13.html
nifty once again delivers! if you nifty this page you will see how
the police troops were split up again and again into smaller units for
maneuvering...the article mentions hills and if you look at a relief
map of where Seinan War battles occur there are plenty of hills...now
what is so hard about learning more about these battles?
NOTHING...there are plenty of names (with Lt. ranks) in the mentioned
article which undoubtedly show up in the huge Japanese books which do
a play by play of every battle in the SEinan WAr (sec is ALWAYS hopeful).

it seems that Fujita G. wasn't the only one shot in the back...
